summary: A command‑line tool that transforms multimodal instruction datasets (text JSON and images) into a packed, indexed format suitable for training NeMo multimodal language models. It tokenizes text, encodes images with a vision encoder, applies a configurable sequence‑packing algorithm to keep tokens and image embeddings within a maximum length, and writes the processed data to an indexed dataset directory.
business_intent: Streamline and optimize the data preparation pipeline for multimodal language model training, enabling efficient sequence packing and reduced padding to improve training speed and resource utilization.
